title: Call Logs
description: Call history management screen for viewing and analyzing phone call records

features.name: Call History Display
features.description: Show detailed call logs including incoming, outgoing, and missed calls
features.developer_perspective: Useful for testing communication apps and call-related features

features.name: Call Details
features.description: Display detailed information about each call including duration, timestamp, contact info
features.developer_perspective: Essential for debugging call functionality and timing issues

features.name: Call Log Filtering
features.description: Filter call logs by type, date range, or contact
features.developer_perspective: Helpful for specific testing scenarios and data analysis
